LICENSES & CERTIFICATION.Name: Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 7 Programmer

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Built a location check-in platform that users can use to make applications that use location check-ins into a blockchain ledger as a service. Hyperledger was used for making the blockchain platform.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Chrome extension to verify authenticity of news article
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Developed a Chrome extension that verifies the authenticity of  news articles that appear on Facebook News Feed. Filters out clickbait and uses Machine Learning algorithms to get similarity index, title and content coherence, time relevance and other parameters that have been used to provide authenticity score as the final output to the user. 

This was the Code.Fun.Do 2017 hackathon project.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Web application for automated donation of excess food
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
The target was to prevent surplus food at restaurants from going down the drain.
It's functioning is based on volunteers who pick up and distribute excess food from restaurants to accumulation points to distribution points (areas reported by users).
The app is functional on mobile devices and provides map and navigation services to the volunteer. The management dashboard provides capabilities to administer the accumulation points and to track live activities.
Implemented Distributed Hash Table using Pastry algorithm. Works on multiple nodes providing functionalities like addition, deletion and message key lookup.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Predicting cycles and their nature in Wolfram's Cellular Automata
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Studying the cyclic structures of specific rules spread across Class I to Class IV  (Wolfram's Cellular Automata) and identifying the attributes of the same. Focused on reversibility of rules and their effects on cycles.
 Arrived at results that could predict the nature of the cycles and attributes of the same.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Mapping tail queries to head queries
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: The objective is to map tail queries to head queries using machine learning and IR tools. This mapping will help us get better results and to understand user intent on searching for tail queries.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Develop a Serverless Platform for hosting microservices
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Building a platform that is used to deploy application services which are non-transactional in nature. The user just needs upload his service via a portal. The platform scales automatically depending on the incoming and computational load, and also provides insights into services that run on it.
Vagrant and Virtualbox have been used for provisioning virtual machines. Docker images have been used as the finest computational unit.
Load Balancing, Logging and other activities are done by the platform and reports are generated for the user.
